Question: This person found Tallahassee musically exciting too, and sat in with the Florida A&M University student band.
Hints: In April 1979, this person' version of "Georgia On My Mind" was proclaimed the state song of Georgia.
By the beginning of the 1980s, this person would reach younger audiences by appearances in various films and TV shows.
This person played chess using a special board with holes for the pieces and raised squares.
